name: Bartend & Defend
description:
The Gilded Guardsman is the most popular tavern in town. Everyone knows it by name and the most renowned adventurers visit it on the regular. But a group of bandits infamous in these parts have been causing the tavern trouble…harassing patrons and demanding free drinks in exchange for ‘protection’.

Due to the tavern owners’ constant refusal, the bandits have staged an all-out assault on the Gilded Guardsman, woefully unaware that the owners and employees of the bar happen to be a party of retired adventurers who will not stand to see their pride and joy fall into the hands of these brigands.

Take on the roles of these bartending adventurers and repel the attacking bandits with whatever you can get your hands on…from improvised weapons to the tavern’s own nigh-endless supply of alcohol.

Built in the Caltrop Core mixed with elements of the RUNE System for TitanomachyRPG's CaltropCore Game Jam!

Required to Play: 

3-4 Players with 3d4 each.

Notepad (digital or otherwise) for 'character sheet'.

Active imagination recommended if not encouraged.
